meaningInfo: Feel free to walk around the Good Building. There are no things or people, except for that one guy. Who is that guy.
readingMnemonic: You talk to that <kanji>guy</kanji>. The only thing he does is offer you <reading>roe</reading> (<ja>ろう</ja>).
readingInfo: You try to talk to the guy, poke him, and even yell at him. But, all he does is hand you some fish roe. When you take it, he offers you more fish roe. What's up with this guy?
